mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and use responsive design principles to improve mobile layout adjustments.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider optimizing page assets like images and scripts to reduce page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta tag usage (e.g., title, description) and optimize alt texts for images to enhance SEO performance.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and improve accessibility features for a smoother user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering more payment options.
